publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-836 Pauline McNeill: All-Party Parliamentary Group on Breast Cancer-That the Parliament thanks Judith Church MP for her work as Secretary to the Westminster All-Party Parliamentary Group (APPG) on Breast Cancer; welcomes Joan Ruddock MP as the new APPG Secretary from June 2000, and is committed to the formation of a Scottish Parliament Cross Party Group on Breast Cancer, and liaison with colleagues in Westminster.
S1M-836 All-Party Parliamentary Group on Breast Cancer (lodged on 10 May 2000) Margaret Jamieson*

S1M-836 Pauline McNeill: All-Party Parliamentary Group on Breast Cancer-That the Parliament thanks Judith Church MP for her work as Secretary to the Westminster All-Party Parliamentary Group (APPG) on Breast Cancer; welcomes Joan Ruddock MP as the new APPG Secretary from June 2000, and is committed to the formation of a Scottish Parliament Cross Party Group on Breast Cancer, and liaison with colleagues in Westminster. Supported by: Margaret Jamieson
S1M-836 All-Party Parliamentary Group on Breast Cancer (lodged on 10 May 2000) Cathy Jamieson*, Elaine Smith*, Karen Gillon*
S1M-836 All-Party Parliamentary Group on Breast Cancer (lodged on 10 May 2000) Marilyn Livingstone*

S1M-836 Pauline McNeill: All-Party Parliamentary Group on Breast Cancer—That the Parliament thanks Judith Church MP for her work as Secretary to the Westminster All-Party Parliamentary Group (APPG) on Breast Cancer; welcomes Joan Ruddock MP as the new APPG Secretary from June 2000, and is committed to the formation of a Scottish Parliament Cross Party Group on Breast Cancer, and liaison with colleagues in Westminster. Supported by: Margaret Jamieson, Cathy Jamieson, Elaine Smith, Karen Gillon, Marilyn Livingstone
S1M-836 All-Party Parliamentary Group on Breast Cancer (lodged on 10 May 2000) Malcolm Chisholm*, Irene Oldfather*
S1M-836 All-Party Parliamentary Group on Breast Cancer (lodged on 10 May 2000) Dr Richard Simpson*
S1M-836 All-Party Parliamentary Group on Breast Cancer (lodged on 10 May 2000) Donald Gorrie*

S1M-836 Pauline McNeill: All-Party Parliamentary Group on Breast Cancer—That the Parliament thanks Judith Church MP for her work as Secretary to the Westminster All-Party Parliamentary Group (APPG) on Breast Cancer; welcomes Joan Ruddock MP as the new APPG Secretary from June 2000, and is committed to the formation of a Scottish Parliament Cross Party Group on Breast Cancer, and liaison with colleagues in Westminster. Supported by: Margaret Jamieson, Cathy Jamieson, Elaine Smith, Karen Gillon, Marilyn Livingstone, Malcolm Chisholm, Irene Oldfather, Dr Richard Simpson, Donald Gorrie, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Helen Eadie*
S1M-836 All-Party Parliamentary Group on Breast Cancer (lodged on 10 May 2000) Mr Michael McMahon*

S1M-836 Pauline McNeill: All-Party Parliamentary Group on Breast Cancer-That the Parliament thanks Judith Church MP for her work as Secretary to the Westminster All-Party Parliamentary Group (APPG) on Breast Cancer; welcomes Joan Ruddock MP as the new APPG Secretary from June 2000, and is committed to the formation of a Scottish Parliament Cross Party Group on Breast Cancer, and liaison with colleagues in Westminster. Supported by: Margaret Jamieson, Cathy Jamieson, Elaine Smith, Karen Gillon, Marilyn Livingstone, Malcolm Chisholm, Irene Oldfather, Dr Richard Simpson, Donald Gorrie, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Helen Eadie, Mr Michael McMahon, Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-836 All-Party Parliamentary Group on Breast Cancer (lodged on 10 May 2000) Cathie Craigie*
